meanings.definition: A pack or bundle containing three items.
meanings.sent1: I bought three tripacks of pencils for school.
meanings.sent2: The store sells tripacks of socks for a good price.
meanings.sent3: Carrying three tripacks of snacks for the picnic was a bit heavy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like opening a tripacks of joy.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with tripacks of gold coins.

meanings.definition: To pack or bundle items into groups of three.
meanings.sent1: She likes to tripacks her clothes neatly in the suitcase.
meanings.sent2: We need to tripacks the books before moving them to the new shelf.
meanings.sent3: He decided to tripacks the sandwiches for the road trip.
meanings.sent4: The bees tripacks the pollen into their hives diligently.
meanings.sent5: The chef will tripacks the ingredients for the recipe.
